summary: The 'Modernizing Wildfire Safety and Prevention Act of 2025' addresses wildfire mitigation and management. It includes provisions for workforce development (Middle Fire Leaders Academy, wildfire workforce grants), wildland firefighter support (retirement benefits, job-sharing), public health (smoke monitoring and alerts, health risk assessment), and fire mitigation technology (forage loss programs, FEMA program improvements, dynamic risk mapping, grant program improvements, and data collaboration). The bill authorizes significant appropriations for these initiatives, aiming to improve wildfire preparedness and response.
